snippet.title: Zombie Pandemia 2D: OFFICIAL TRAILER - Available on Google Play, soon on Steam
snippet.description:
Download the Christmas Update on Google Play!

● https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.spaceghosttriff.zp2d

► OTHER LINKS
SUPPORT THE DEVELOPER:   https://guns.lol/triff
MUSIC THEME:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKxWfpCRj9k
GAME FORUM:   https://zombiepandemia2d.proboards.com

---------------------------------------------------------------
